responses.content: No reunion at Seawatch/Riverwatch this day. Party departing Khuzdukan. No advance.

5 NPCs act offscreen on 27th Ilrym. Lithoe begins rest (sending network prep deferred until rested). Lalholm tends to Lithoe, begins theological prep for sending anchor. Thordak maintains ward-chamber security, reports silence holds. Joppa at Vornost continues Dragon Throne preparations, second courier returns confirming Thoron heading south. Conorth at Caras processes Vael evidence — initial review, no action yet.

state_changes.text: NPAG 27th Ilrym: Lithoe resting (critical exhaustion); Lalholm theological prep; Thordak ward-chamber watch (silence holds); Joppa Dragon Throne prep (second courier returned); Conorth reviewing Vael customs evidence (no action yet)
